quote: Always turn a negative situation into a positive situation. – Michael Jordan
fact: If we had the same mortality rate now as in 1900, more than half the people in the world today would not be alive.
joke: Why do scuba divers fall backwards into the water? Because if they fell forwards they’d still be in the boat.
